Test Name: BRAF and KIT Mutation Analysis (NGS, Tumor)
Specimen Type: Formalin-fixed paraffin-embedded (FFPE) tissue or fresh frozen tumor tissue
Purpose: To detect BRAF and KIT gene mutations in tumor samples using next-generation sequencing for clinical decision-making.
Container: FFPE tissue block or cryovial for fresh frozen tissue
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, target enrichment/library preparation kit, and next-generation sequencer (e.g., Illumina or Thermo Fisher platform)
